Title: Prohibits the disclosure of personally identifiable information by an internet service provider without the express written approval of the consumer
Summary: Prohibits the disclosure of personally identifiable information by an internet service provider without the express written approval of the consumer.
LawCode: Add ยง399-k, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to prohibiting the disclosure of personally identifiable information by an internet service provider without the express written approval of the consumer
